arts.ttl: Fantastic Stevenage beat Wrexham 1-0 in League One
arts.sum: A goal 10 minutes in by Louis Thompson put them in front and a superbly organised and determined defence brought them the win. Stevenage: Cooper, Wildin, Butler, N.Thompson, Piergianni, Roberts, Reid (Simpson 75), Phillips, L.Thompson, King (White 75), Young (Kemp 60).

arts.ttl: Stevenage impress in narrow victory over Wrexham
arts.sum: Louis Thompson scored the only goal of the game.

arts.ttl: Stevenage chairman: Wrexham an example to follow as are we
arts.sum: Speaking in his programme notes prior to Tuesday's game, the Boro supremo said: "The incredible marketing machine that Wrexham have created since the well-publicised investment by their US owners is an example to all lower league clubs as to what’s possible if you have the contacts, determination and the funds. We’ve made our fair share of wrong turns, which obviously seemed right when made, but it’s how you recover from them that’s the key factor.

arts.ttl: Rob McElhenney explains his and Ryan Reynolds' dressing room involvement at Wrexham
arts.sum: Wrexham co-owner Rob McElhenney spoke about his and Ryan Reynolds' roles in a conversation with NFL legend Tom Brady before the club's 3-1 defeat to Birmingham City last month

arts.ttl: Rob McElhenney's Wrexham dressing room comments speak volumes about him and Ryan Reynolds
arts.sum: Wrexham co-owner Rob McElhenney has spoken about how he and Ryan Reyonolds deal with the dressing room, which is different to Tom Brady's approach at Birmingham City

arts.ttl: Premier League legend makes feelings clear on Wrexham owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney
arts.sum: Wrexham have been transformed since Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney took over the club in 2020, with the Red Dragons now competing in League One for the first time in 20 years

arts.ttl: Wrexham and Birmingham City fined after match watched by David Beckham and Tom Brady
arts.sum: Wrexham and Birmingham were involved in a fiesty League One clash a fortnight ago, with the FA now handing out punishments to both sides after a melee erupted late into the game

arts.ttl: Stevenage's Alex Revell believes the improvements are coming
arts.sum: The Stevenage boss was bathed in a huge grin after Boro recorded a 1-0 win at home to Charlton Athletic, lifting them into the top half of the League One table after eight games. Moments give you belief, Pidge’s header off the line gives you belief that you're going to win the game.

arts.ttl: Wrexham injury update emerges regarding 22-year-old after Leyton Orient draw
arts.sum: Wrexham boss Phil Parkinson has said Max Cleworth has suffered ankle ligament damage. Wrexham will get the defender… The post Wrexham injury update emerges regarding 22-year-old after Leyton Orient draw appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
